message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product.  It's incredibly valuable and I know it has the potential to greatly benefit you. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000.  I'm open to discussing this further and finding a solution that works for both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I am willing to pay up to $900,000 for it.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective, however, the value of this product to the right buyer is significantly higher.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,350,000.  I believe this price reflects the true worth of what's being offered.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I am willing to pay $1,200,000 for it.
